NHM Assam Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 78 Medical Officer Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 14, 2025, 14:24 IST
 National Health Mission
 78 Jobs |  Posted On : 14-Aug-2025 |  Assam |  Salary : 50,000 to 50,000




FOLLOW

National Health Mission (NHM) Assam has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 78 Medical Officer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the BAMS can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the NHM Assam Recruitment 2025. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Assam.

NHM Assam Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Medical Officer 	78	BAMS

Age Limit for the NHM Assam Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 40 years.

Age Relaxation

OBC/MOBC Candidates: 03 Years
SC/ST (P)/ST (H) Candidates: 05 Years
PWD Candidates: 10 Years

Selection Process for the NHM Assam Recruitment 2025

Written Test
Interview

Salary Structure for the NHM Assam Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 50,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the NHM Assam Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the NHM Assam Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Medical Officer Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligbility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Pay the application fee (if applicable)
Submit the application form and capture the application number for further reference.

Important Dates

Stating Date of Application	13-08-2025
Last Date of Application	27-08-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
